casebody.data:
HOUSING AUTHORITY
v.
CREECH. No. 114P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 25, 2008. Robert Spence, Jr., Smithfield, for Smithfield Housing Authority.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of March 2008 by Defendant for "Dual Petitions for Temporary Stays and Extraordinary Process Writ of Supersedeas":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of March 2008."
